displayName.thai: อุ้งเท้าเจ๋งกว่าหนวด

description.brazilian: Derrotou o Gathulhu, o flagelo do oceano.
description.english: Defeated Cathulhu, the menace of the ocean.
description.french: Vous avez battu Chathulhu, le fléau de l'océan.
description.german: Katzhulu, die Plage des Ozeans, besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Gatthulhu, la minaccia degli oceani!
description.japanese: 海の脅威、キャットゥルフを倒した。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a Gathulhu, la amenaza del océano.
description.tchinese: 擊敗大海的威脅，邪神喵蘇魯。
description.thai: กำจัดตำนานแคททูลู ภัยคุกคามแห่งมหาสมุทร

displayName.brazilian: Lá vai o pato, pata aqui, pata acolá
displayName.japanese: クワッと鳴くならアヒルちゃん
displayName.thai: ร้องก๊าบเป็นเป็ดเลยนะ

description.brazilian: Derrotou o Pataclísmico, o senhor dos sete mares.
description.english: Defeated the Duck of Doom, the ruler of the seven seas!
description.french: Vous avez battu le Canard Vexé, souverain des sept mers !
description.german: Die Ente des Todes, den Herrscher der sieben Weltmeere, besiegt!
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la Sventuranatra, dominatrice dei sette mari!
description.japanese: 7つの海の支配者、破滅のアヒルを倒した！
description.koreana: 일곱 바다의 지배자 파멸의 오리를 물리쳤습니다!
description.russian: Вы победили Ужасающую Утку, властителя семи морей!
description.schinese: 打败七海统治者，毁灭之鸭！
description.spanish: ¡Has derrotado al Pato Funesto, el líder de los siete mares!
description.tchinese: 擊敗七大洋的統治者，末日之鴨！
description.thai: กำจัดเป็ดแห่งความดับสูญ ผู้ปกครองทะเลทั้งเจ็ด!

displayName.brazilian: Hoje é dia de rock, bebê
displayName.japanese: やってやろうぜ、スーパースター！
displayName.thai: ร็อกออน ซูเปอร์สตาร์!

description.brazilian: Derrotou o Capitão Miautallika, o líder dos miautaleiros.
description.english: Defeated Captain Meowtallika, the leader of the Meowtallika crew.
description.french: Vous avez battu le Capitaine Metallichat, à la tête des métalleux.
description.german: Kapitän Miautallika, den Anführer der Miautallika-Crew, besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Capitano Miaotallika, capo della ciurma di Miaotallika!
description.japanese: ニャータリカのリーダー、ニャータリカ船長を倒した。
description.koreana: 묘탈리카 해적단의 선장 묘탈리카 선장을 물리쳤습니다.
description.russian: Вы победили капитана Мяуталлику, предводителя металюг.
description.schinese: 打败喵塔利卡船队领袖，喵塔利卡船长。
description.spanish: Has derrotado al capitán Miautallika, el líder de la tripulación de Miautallika.
description.tchinese: 擊敗金屬喵品海賊團的頭領，金屬喵品船長。
description.thai: กำจัดกัปตันเหมียวทาลิก้า ผู้นำโจรสลัดเหมียวทาลิก้้า

description.german: Den Pirattenkönig, den Anführer der Piratten, besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Re dei Pi-ratti, capo dei pi-ratti!
description.japanese: パイレーチュのリーダー、パイレーチュ王を倒した。
